sightings.summary: 1 object consisting of 2 large yellow lights connected and preceded by a smaller white flashing bright light. No sound or smell.
One large orange light, thought too high for helicopter and no nav lights as on fixed wing aircraft

sightings.text: I know nothing at all about "U.F.O.'s", and the subject does not interest me. But nothing of what I saw or experienced, was "in my imagination". Of that, I am certain. Later that day, I telephoned R.A.F. Pieteavie, to enquire as to whether there had been any unusual air activity that day. I was told there had not been. I am an aircraft enthusiast myself, and pride myself in their recognition. I know that what I saw was no conventional aircraft.
sightings.summary: Metallic and had several points of diffused light on its underside, inside a darker coloured "rim".
Long and thin with two fins at the back. Silver/White
One object. No physical shape discernible, however thought to be sound due to the 6/7 bright lights round perimeter. Silent.
Sphere shaped. White. Not possible to determine size.
1 spinning top with red, green and red flashing lights. No sound of smell

sightings.weather: Dry, believed high cloud as no stars visible
sightings.summary: 1 round to oval shaped object with piece missing out of center. Sometimes had 2 points on top. Pale yellow in colour with bright dot on edge
1 fireball shaped, very bright, red and orange coloured object

sightings.text: This beam was described as similar to a laser of lighthouse beam in its movement. Exact height or distance was not determined but in between viewers and object was a line of trees about 50 feet in height.
sightings.weather: Clear visibility apart from low down slight mist and a fine drizzle
sightings.location: North Bransholme, Kingston upon Hull North
sightings.summary: Initially a single powerful beam of light was seen spinning around in the sky.
1 large circular white object with short tail. Very bright with no smell or noise
4 lights shimmering yellow. 4 lights in a line changed to form diamond shape

sightings.text: People were seen jumping from the objects same thing was seen 3 years ago
sightings.summary: 3 bright lights (helicopters) hovering
2 white lights, circular, very bright, no noise or smell
1 very bright, large object

sightings.weather: Low cloud. Intermittent moonlight through breaks in cloud. No rain.
sightings.summary: 4 flashing lights – rapidly green in colour, shining through cloud cover

sightings.text: No movement which caught his attention, different to aircraft
sightings.summary: Slightly odd. Saw a triangle of light, self illuminated. Equilateral, colour yellow/silver

sightings.text: 2 or 3 objects seen in formation. Shape not known.
sightings.weather: Very clear sky, stars and moon
sightings.summary: White bright light bigger than a star. Light flashing. Red light on left, green light on right and flashing white lights underneath
Oval type shape being 6ft wide and 2ft high with red and green lights all round its circumference.
One – ball with long tail – bright with sparks

sightings.text: Bullet shaped about the size of medium ... no sound or smell detected. Object moved from south of observer and disappeared from observer, beaming around 260°. Object moved horizontally at around 800mph. Last seen N. side of Epsom Common
sightings.summary: 1 very bright object, lime green colour with rocket-like orange trail.
